title: Focus on leisure
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Outdoor recreation - Great Britain
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Leisure
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Great Britain - Social conditions
Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Outdoor recreation - Great Britain
description: A survey of how the British people spend their leisure time. Today, people have more leisure time than ever before and the film shows scenes of some of the ways in which they spend it. Stress is placed on the fact that more and more people are today utilising their leisure in learning about other occupations and acquiring new interests.
